content.details: Successfully created comprehensive EXECUTION_FLOW.md documentation. PR #14 has been merged to main branch. Documentation covers all system phases, retry logic, file flow architecture, and practical examples.

Successfully reviewed and merged all documentation PRs for TASK-045A through TASK-045C. All documentation files (SYSTEM_OVERVIEW.md, EXECUTION_FLOW.md, AGENT_ARCHITECTURE.md) are now in main branch. TASK_CARDS.md has been updated to reflect completion of all TASK-045 subtasks. Feature branches have been cleaned up. Phase 4 documentation is complete and ready for Phase 5.
